entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:15 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
